name: Cat Jumper
storyline: A cat woke up in the midst of a global flood. So he tried to escape from there and uses his expert jumping skills to survive the situation. But it's not that easy. When the shark suddenly escapes from the aquarium and found a cat that was surviving. The shark want to keep a cats for food. So when a cat is fleeing and misses. The shark will intervene by bringing the cat to the starting point again.
summary:
This game is a little difficult and requires memory , simulation and distance calculation from jump. This game has checkpoints but it doesn't seem to have it.
in this game you will be a cat and if you fall into water, you will be disturbed by shark and the shark brought you to staring point again and again. so be careful.
